price: Wọn yóò wí pé: “A gbàgbọ́ nínú (al-Ƙur’ān báyìí).” Báwo ni ọwọ́ wọn ṣe lè tẹ ìgbàgbọ́ òdodo láti àyè tó jìnnà (ìyẹn, ọ̀run).”
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū āmannā bihi wa-annā lahumu al-tanāwushu min makānin baʿīdin
